brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts H1 connected to switch S1, which is connected to F A 0 /0 of router, R1. This is the stub network with the network address 172.16.3.0 /24. R1, the stub router, is connected to S0/0/0 of router R2 on the network. The link from R1 to R2 is a default route; the link from R2 to R1 is a static route.

R1 (config) # IP route 0.0.0.0 0.0.0.0 s0/0/0
R1 (config) # end

R1 # show IP route
[output omitted]

Gateway of last resort is 0.0.0.0 to network 0.0.0.0

172.16.0.0 /24 is subnetted, 2 subnets
C172.16.2.0 is directly connected, Serial0/0/0
C172.16.3.0 is directly connected, FastEthernet0/0
S0.0.0.0 /0 is directly connected, Serial0/0/0
